name: Icewind Arrow
description: The arrows from this bow carry the power of frost.

skills.normal_des:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
skills.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
skills.skill: Perform a backflip and fire <shuzhi>3</> piercing shots, with the main shot deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, and the other two shots deal 60% damage. In addition, <shuzhi>knock targets back</> and stun them for <shuzhi>5</> seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</>, and create a hailstorm at the target location upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. The storm has a <shuzhi>10%</> chance to inflict a <shuzhi>2</> seconds <shuzhi>freeze effect</>. Gain cold front, and increase speed by <shuzhi>45%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.
